intent: When the sunset at my location is between 16:00 and 20:00 and the current temperature in degrees Celsius is above 15, turn on all Philips Hue lights in the living room.
When a Triple Knock gesture is detected by the Knocki device KNC1-W-00000088, toggle the Yeelight device.

When a new item is added to Pocket with the tag "article" and the title contains the word "productivity", send an event to Welltory with the data source set to "Pocket", the data type set to "reading", the datetime set to the time the item was added, the value set to 1, and a comment describing the applet as "Tracking productivity articles saved to Pocket".
When the "iH" button on the iHome device is pressed, either short or long press, turn all Philips Hue lights ON if they are currently OFF, or turn them OFF if they are currently ON.

When the humidity level is above 60% and the temperature is between 18Â°C and 22Â°C in New York, send a rich notification with the title "Weather Alert", message "Humidity is high, consider taking necessary precautions", link URL "http://www.weather.com/weather/5-day/GMXX1273", and image URL "https://example.com/high-humidity-image.jpg" to notify users to be prepared.

When a new video is posted on Instagram with the tag #MorningMotivation, send an event to Welltory with the data source as "Social Media", data type as "Engagement", datetime set to the time the video was created, value as 1, and comment as "New morning motivation video posted".
Turn on the Living Room Lamp device when the sun sets in New York, and the current temperature is above 18Â°C.

Send a notification with the image from https://example.com/image.png to all Triby devices every weekday at 08:00.

Turn on my Ambi Climate device, named "Living Room A/C", every day at 3:00 PM with the Ambi Climate app.

Turn ON the garden lights in Futurehome by running the 'Garden Lights Sunset' shortcut when the sunset time is reached at the location of 40.7128Â° N, 74.0060Â° W, as provided by Weather Underground, and the current weather condition is Sunny.

When a new photo post is published on the "staff" Tumblelog, send an event to Welltory with the data source set to "Tumblr", the data type set to "Photo Post", the datetime set to the post's creation time (e.g., 2022-01-01T12:00:00+00:00), the value set to "1" for one entry per event, and a comment describing the applet as "Tracking photo posts on staff Tumblelog".

filter_code:

filter_code:
IfNotifications.sendRichNotification
  .setMessage("Tomorrow's weather in New York City: " + Weather.tomorrowsWeatherAtTime.TomorrowsCondition + ", High of " + Weather.tomorrowsWeatherAtTime.HighTempFahrenheit + "Â°F (" + Weather.tomorrowsWeatherAtTime.HighTempCelsius + "Â°C), Low of " + Weather.tomorrowsWeatherAtTime.LowTempFahrenheit + "Â°F (" + Weather.tomorrowsWeatherAtTime.LowTempCelsius + "Â°C)")
  .setTitle("Tomorrow's Weather Forecast")
  .setLinkUrl(Weather.tomorrowsWeatherAtTime.ForecastUrl)
  .setImageUrl(Weather.tomorrowsWeatherAtTime.ConditionImageURL);

If Weather Underground reports that it is raining now at my location, with a current condition of "Rain" and a temperature of 18Â°C, then do not water my yard using the Netro device named "Front Yard Sprinkler" for the next 2 days, skipping watering for zones 1 and 2.

Every time your Fitbit syncs on a new day, such as 2023-03-08, append a new row to the Google Sheets spreadsheet named "Fitness Tracker" with the previous day's stats, including total steps taken (e.g., 10500), total floors climbed (e.g., 12), total calories burned from BMR and activity (e.g., 2200), total elevation gained in meters (e.g., 250), total distance covered in kilometers (e.g., 6.5), sedentary minutes (e.g., 25), lightly active minutes (e.g., 30), fairly active minutes (e.g., 20), and very active minutes (e.g., 15), using the formatted row "Date|||Total Steps|||Total Floors Climbed|||Total Calories Burned|||Total Elevation Gained|||Total Distance Covered|||Sedentary Minutes|||Lightly Active Minutes|||Fairly Active Minutes|||Very Active Minutes" and placing the file in the Drive folder path "Fitness/2023".
filter_code:
GoogleSheets.appendToGoogleSpreadsheet.setFilename("Fitness Tracker");
GoogleSheets.appendToGoogleSpreadsheet.setPath("Fitness/2023");
var formattedRow = Fitbit.newDailyActivitySummary.Date + "|||" +
                   Fitbit.newDailyActivitySummary.TotalSteps + "|||" +
                   Fitbit.newDailyActivitySummary.TotalFloorsClimbed + "|||" +
                   Fitbit.newDailyActivitySummary.TotalCaloriesBurned + "|||" +
                   Fitbit.newDailyActivitySummary.TotalElevationGained + " " +
                   Fitbit.newDailyActivitySummary.TotalElevationGainedUnit + "|||" +
                   Fitbit.newDailyActivitySummary.TotalDistanceCovered + " " +
                   Fitbit.newDailyActivitySummary.TotalDistanceCoveredUnit + "|||" +
                   Fitbit.newDailyActivitySummary.SedentaryMinutes + "|||" +
                   Fitbit.newDailyActivitySummary.LightlyActiveMinutes + "|||" +
                   Fitbit.newDailyActivitySummary.FairlyActiveMinutes + "|||" +
                   Fitbit.newDailyActivitySummary.VeryActiveMinutes;
GoogleSheets.appendToGoogleSpreadsheet.setFormattedRow(formattedRow);
